reviews.review: A great game and some toxic players
Would recommend if you are into fps games. Very difficult to be good at but a fun grind. Would recommend playing lots of deathmatch before hopping straight into comp.

one of my favorite multiplayer games. Not for starting out in shooters though, if you have great tactition skills put them to good use with this game. Also i recommend buying prime for 15$ for the faster load in times and less hackers.
el juego es bien divertido y sirve para pasar el rato con amigos

Comunidade péssima!!! Brasileiro pnc e boludo czão! Se for jogar, jogue com amigos e lobby fechado.

Yes this game is valves best creation yet and will forever be one of the best games ever made. the way they have set up the game, market and community will never ever compare to anything else. Or prove me wrong in the future... but for now the game is a 11/10 and is a fully working piece of art!
